sections.heading: to 44-4-5 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1995, ch. 81, § 11 repealed 44-4-1 to 44-4-5 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1917, ch. 72, §§ 1 through 5, relating to actions against receivers, effective June 16, 1995. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1994 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present provisions relating to receivers,seeChapter 44, Article 8 NMSA 1978.
